name: (Kian)
bio: The most cool and performative ðŸŒ¹

Weapon1.PrimaryD: Punches enemies in front of Keieon, alternating fists.
Weapon1.SecondaryD: On cooldown, reduced when using abilities. Slam the ground in a medium area around Keieon. If airborne, crash into the ground.

Ability1D: Keieon dashes into enemies, spinning his wings in a circle, knocking up enemies in his path.
Ability2D: Launch a ranged attack with Keieons large wings, damage is boosted while in the air.
PassiveD: Keieon can charge his jump on a short cooldown, launching him high in the air. He can glide while in his passive.
UltimateD: Keieon leaps high into the air, and can select one of his teammates to jump to. On landing he yells 'THE DUNK PROPHECY' and stuns all enemies in a large radius around his landing, while providing teammates in the radius a small shield.
